name: Saphyro
description:
Saphyro is a casual physics game. Your task is to collect white cubes that randomly appear on the playing area, for each cube you get one point. The difficulty is that multicolored platforms appear in random places that move in a random direction, and if you hit at least one of them, you will lose and you will have to start over. Also, the cube that you control is constantly in motion, and you can only change the direction of this movement. Use your reaction speed and ingenuity. How many points can you collect?

Features

- Simple gameplay

- Minimalistic graphics

- Pleasant music
